title: gold 3 sup/ad/mid LF skilled team that likes to have fun
body: Hey all, been playing league for a few years now, pretty skilled at the game. I'm looking for good players that want to win but also have a laugh and have some good times! See how well we can do from there. I play alot and watch alot of streams (have good knowledge of the game). Im 24 and caucasian if that makes any difference :P peace
